title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: Currently, when searching for declarations by using the search functionality in the Package view selection and dialog, no results are being shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that the search functionality should display the relevant results when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Right-click on a package and select 'Search' from the context menu.
3. In the search dialog that appears, enter a search term for a declaration.
4. Click on the 'Search' button.
5. Observe that no results are displayed.
